parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the lane group.

parameters.name: IngressGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the ingress gateway.

parameters.name: IngressType
parameters.description: The type of the gateway for ingress traffic. Only ASM ingress gateways are supported.

parameters.name: IsPermissive
parameters.description: Specifies whether the permissive mode is enabled for the lane group to be created.

parameters.name: RouteHeader
parameters.description: The request routing header of the lane group if you plan to create a lane group in permissive mode. This parameter must be specified when IsPermissive is set to true.

parameters.name: ServiceMeshId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

parameters.name: ServicesList
parameters.description: A list of services associated with the lane group. The value is a JSON array. The format of a service is `$Cluster name/$Cluster ID/$Namespace/$Service name`.

parameters.name: TraceHeader
parameters.description: The end-to-end (E2E) pass-through request header of the lane group if you plan to create a lane group in permissive mode. This parameter must be specified when IsPermissive is set to true.
